welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Friedrichsdorf, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our quaint city, known for its picturesque streets and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Friedrichsdorf has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal mainly used by Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and set to open in 2023, this terminal will serve as the main hub for Lufthansa and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights and some low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
